location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'L. Shaikh Ghassan bin Salim, Beni Uma [?]. C. Shaikh Hamad bin Rakadh [?], Awamir [?]. C. Shaikh Rashid bin Hamad, of Hamasah, Al Bu Shams. L.C. Shaikh Mohamed bin Hamad, younger brother of above. R.C. Son of Shaikh Rashid. R. Shaikh Ibrahim bin Uthman, Abu Dhabi Wali'

mods.abstract: Two black and white photographs with their subjects identified in writing below each one. The first shows Shaikh Ghassan bin Salim, Beni Uma [?]. Shaikh Hamad bin Rakadh [?], Awamir [?] and a third unidentified man. The second shows eleven figures standing against a wall, the following of whom are identified: Shaikh Rashid bin Hamad of Hamasah (of the Al Bu Shams tribe), Shaikh Mohamed bin Hamad, (the younger brother of Shaikh Rashid), a son of Shaikh Rashid (not named) and Shaikh Ibrahim bin Uthman, the Wali of Abu Dhabi.
